definitions.word: You took the words right out of my mouth
definitions.enDefinition: used to indicate that someone has said exactly what you were thinking or about to say
definitions.ptDefinition: usado para indicar que alguém disse exatamente o que você estava pensando ou prestes a dizer

examples.enExample: When she suggested going for pizza, I said, 'You took the words right out of my mouth!'
examples.ptExample: Quando ela sugeriu comer pizza, eu disse: 'Você tirou as palavras da minha boca!'
